mapper.select: SELECT survey_id, st_mobile, complete_yn, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id from starget where survey_id = :1
mapper.update: insert into starget ( survey_id, st_mobile, complete_yn, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( :1, :2, :3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :4, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :5 )
update starget set complete_yn =:1, up_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), up_user_id =:2 where survey_id=:3 and st_mobile=:4
delete from starget where survey_id = :3 and st_mobile= :4
